data.text: @ThomasHHChan Those people either crazy or trying to please #CCPChina without limit. Most western countries r taking “living with virus”. Have most of them died? 😵‍💫
@ThomasHHChan China's State affiliated media do narrative writing, not truth reporting. Why demand Hong Kong to achieve zero Covid even China could not itself?
@ThomasHHChan The stories they create are getting more and more ridiculous😆😆
@ThomasHHChan One modification: Ta Kung Pao is not Pro BJ, it is actually run by Beijing.
@ktse852 @ThomasHHChan I'm sorry I bit my own lip from laughing

@VerbatimHKG @ThomasHHChan He must be very good at hypnotising himself. He wrote all his own reviews on Google (apart from the 1-star review).

And, the article does not make sense at all. I guess TKP is running out of targets. Can you imagine… they got their “breaking news” photog to cover this guy. https://t.co/2PMlqZZsMj
@ThomasHHChan I'd really like to work there. I LOVE creative writing it's like my dream
